description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nCorrosion:
After this creature {ACTION_attacks}, it afflicts the target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}. If the target is already afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}, the target is healed for 100% of the amount of damage dealt.
name: Interloper Goo
